feed.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3

entry.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3
entry.summary: Matt Corallo has announced that Wallet Encryption is in a pull-able state after a lot of good discussion and a tiny bit of results. He has requested for final comments/ACKs on the same. He has also provided a link to the Github pull request (https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/352) where he rebased onto the wallet class and claims it's ready for "wtf is this crap" messages.
